response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly a masterpiece, crafted with the finest materials and expertise. It's not just an object; it's an experience that elevates any setting it's placed in. Given its exceptional quality and uniqueness, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12,000. Considering its rarity and the value it could bring to your collection or business, I'm offering it to you for $15,000. This is an opportunity to own something truly special. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 15000}
